decision_conditions: The decision to refuse the details pursuant to Condition 4 & 5 of planning permission Ref:  230266FUL dated 17/03/2023 has been taken having regard to the policies and proposals in the Ealing Local Plan and to all relevant material considerations including Supplementary Planning Guidance:
Policy 1.2 Delivery of the vision for Ealing
Policy 5.10 EALING LOCAL VARIATION - URBAN GREENING
Ealing's SPD9 - Trees and Development Guidelines.
In reaching this decision consideration was given to specific documents referenced as
Rear Ground Floor Flat, 60a Mill Hill Road, Arboricultural Site Supervision Schedule Revision A (April, 2023)
Rear Ground Floor Flat, 60a Mill Hill Road, Arboricultural Impact Assessment and Method Statement Revision E (April, 2023)
Rear Ground Floor Flat, 60a Mill Hill Road, Tree Protection Plan, (Ref: 22-1395-TPP-B, Date: 14.04.2023)

The submitted documentation is considered contrary to the requirements of Condition 4 & 5 to allow for full discharge and it is considered that there is material consideration in this case that would warrant a refusal of the application.
description: Details of Tree Monitoring Plan and Tree Protection Plan  pursuant to condition 4 & 5 of planning permission 230266FUL dated 17/03/2023  for: Single storey rear and side extension (following demolition of existing rear/side extension) to extend the existing studio self-contained flat into a 1 bed self-contained flat, together with associated landscaping.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
